thread.title: MMA news: MMA fighter SHOWBOATS during fight and immediately suffers brutal knockout | Metro News
thread.title_full: MMA news: MMA fighter SHOWBOATS during fight and immediately suffers brutal knockout | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: MMA news: MMA fighter SHOWBOATS during fight and immediately suffers brutal knockout | Metro News
text:
Video: McGregor steps up Mayweather preparation by training with Olympic medalist boxer 
UFC star Conor McGregor loves the strut before his fights while Bellator fighter Michael ‘Venom’ Page has often been guilty of busting a move mid-clash. 
But in most cases, showboating in the middle of a fight is a fantastically stupid thing to do. 
Not only is it stupid, it’s downright dangerous to your health as amateur fighter Joe Harding found out against Johan Segas on Saturday. I hate when guys do this shit and this is what happens when u do pic.twitter.com/yEma1oMs47 
— Dana White (@danawhite) February 19, 2017 
The featherweight pair were fighting for British Challenge MMA’s title at BCMMA 18 in Colchester when Harding decided to crack open his dancing repertoire. 
Unfortunately for Harding, Segas was not hypnotized by his moves and delivered a brutal head-kick that put his showboating opponent to sleep. Joe Harding was on the floor for a long time being seen to by the medics but thankfully was able to walk himself out of the cage. #BCMMA18
